Name: Yogesh

Name: Joe

Compliment: Really liked how in the recent episode, David mentioned grounding early-stage investing in real data instead of hype, and how you both kept the conversation brutally honest yet encouraging for angels and founders navigating 2025’s tougher funding landscape.

Name: Sub Club
